```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r theme_hc, cache = TRUE}
(qplot(hp, mpg, data = mtcars, geom = "point")
+ scale_colour_hc()
+ ggtitle("Diamond Prices")
+ theme_hc())
## Use a Dark-Unica theme
(qplot(hp, mpg, data = mtcars, geom = "point")
+ scale_colour_hc("darkunica")
+ ggtitle("Diamond Prices")
+ theme_hc(bgcolor = "darkunica"))



```
